remarks: The set of simple paths of length 2 between two vertices (in a graph) as ordered triple.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Mar-2018.)
statement:
2spthonot $p |- ( ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y ) /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) ) -> ( A ( V 2SPathOnOt E ) B ) = { t e. ( ( V X. V ) X. V ) | E. f E. p ( f ( A ( V SPathOn E ) B ) p /\ ( # ` f ) = 2 /\ ( ( 1st ` ( 1st ` t ) ) = A /\ ( 2nd ` ( 1st ` t ) ) = ( p ` 1 ) /\ ( 2nd ` t ) = B ) ) } ) $.
$d A f p t $.
$d B f p t $.
$d E f p t $.
$d V f p t $.
